fullText:
Polite users and LLMs are wasting millions of dollars!
Napkin math: 
> Say "Please" and "thank you" costs ~3 tokens per ChatGPT exchange. 
> At GPT-4o rates, that's ~$0.00003 each time. 
> Multiply by 800M chats/day and that's "wasting" ~$9.5M/year on politeness üòÖ
